summary: Epic Castle, Epic Location, Epic Views
descriptionHtml:
Large Player home, 
* 45 working weapons racks, cases, and plaques, (plus 6 non-functioning in the barracks... for now)
* 6 fully functioning mannequins (pain in the butt), 
* 1 fully functioning Shield plaque (even bigger pain in the butt), will add more in future
* fully nav-meshed and follower friendly 
* complete array of crafting stations, 
* tons of non-respawning storage, 
* map marker,
* no god or cheat items,

Currently working on:
* NPC\'s, NPC\'s, NPC\'s. Putting together a 14 man/woman garrison, including a captain, a court wizard, 2 corporals, and 10 soldiers. Also working towards a personal servant, a cook, a blacksmith, and a quartermaster/merchant.
 
UPDATE: Version 1.1
* fixed pathing issues on the ramparts
* fixed terrace boundary issue (can\'t walkoff edge anymore)
* cleaned up surrounding terrain
* added more light and clutter
* expanded south terrace and added alchemy garden and servants quarters
* added door to master bedroom
* added tanning rack in courtyard

Future Plans: 
* Figure out how to get the spouse to live there
* Figure Papyrus scripting out so i can hold banquets with friends and allies
* Eventually I\'d like to add a third option to the Imperial vs. Stormcloak conflict ... \"take Skyrim for yourselves\" with this castle as headquarters.
author: Chuckhustle

files.name: Darkwater Keep
files.changelogHtml:
All pathing problems fixed
Added more lighting and clutter
Expanded south terrace added alchemy garden and servants quarters, added tanning rack
Fixed terrace boundary issue, can\'t walk off the edge anymore
